nodes.text: Grunta's podracer was a Podracer piloted by the Dug Grunta. The Podracer itself was owned by the Muun gambler Nal Kenuun. In 0 ABY, after the battle of Yavin, Grunta was killed by the Rebel Luke Skywalker. The Rebel was captured by Kenuun and in exchange for his and his companion's lives, Skywalker offered to race for Kenuun. While practicing for the race, the Podracer's current filter turned out to be defective. The Podracer shot into an out of control spin before crashing into the ground, completely destroying the vehicle.
